Class Garden

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.vestigo.java.tecaj.zadaca4.garden.Garden

  • public class Garden
extends java.lang.Object
    Garden class. Describes the garden which consists of plots.
    Author:
    Šimun

    • Constructor Detail

      • Garden

        public Garden(java.lang.String gardenLayout)
        Constructor of the class. Takes a layout of plots and constructs garden with those plots.
        Parameters:
        gardenLayout - String which is array of letters 'F'(Flowerbed) and 'O'(Orchard), which describe types and positions of plots in garden.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Method which prints all the plants in the garden in a formatted way.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String "0"

      • addWater

        public void addWater()
        Waters all plants in the garden.

      • plant

        public int plant(Plantable p)
        Plants a plant on available spot
        Parameters:
        p - Plantable to be planted.
        Returns:
        0 if the planting was succesful, -1 if planting was unsuccesful and the plant was Tree object, -2 if planting was unsuccesful and the plant was Flower object.
